testimonials.name: Shri Arvind Kejriwal
testimonials.title: CM NEW DELHI
testimonials.quote: “Career guidance is very important for the kids and parents to know which area they can build their careers. I am very happy to see the way these programs are helping students ”

testimonials.name: Prof Arvind Sahay
testimonials.title: DEAN IIM AHMEDABAD
testimonials.quote: “I can see most of the are making default career choices like engineering and MBA however most of them need to ask what is  best career suitable career for me and choose the same”

testimonials.name: Dr A.D Sahasrabudhe
testimonials.title: CHAIRMAN, AICTE
testimonials.quote: “Knowing the right career is the first step towards building your careers. Career Corner’s programs are addressing this very important need.”

testimonials.name: Dr Kiran Bedi
testimonials.title: IPS GOVERNOR OF PUDUCHERRY
testimonials.quote: “Every student is special and possesses unique potential which when harnessed at right time can make miracles. I am glad hat Career Corner is helping students with their guidance program ”
